Class RMIImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMIImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, RMIInterface
    public class RMIImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements RMIInterface
    Class responsible for Database communication. Implements RMIInterface so it can be exported.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.sql.Connection connection
      Database connection created.
      private java.lang.String database
      Name of the database to be used.
      private java.lang.String driver
      Database connector's class name
      private java.lang.String password
      Password used to access the database
      private java.sql.Statement statement
      Used to execute SQL.
      private java.lang.String url
      Url of the database server
      private java.lang.String username
      Username to access the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Makes preparations to create a db connection.

      Makes preparations to create a db connection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • RMIImplementation

        public RMIImplementation()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Makes preparations to create a db connection. Then calls connect() to create the connection and statement.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • RMIImplementation

        public RMIImplementation​(java.lang.String driver,
                         java.lang.String url,
                         java.lang.String database,
                         java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Makes preparations to create a db connection. Then calls connect() to create the connection and statement.
        Parameters:
        driver - Database connector's class name
        url - Url of the database server
        database - Name of the database to be used.
        username - Username to access the database.
        password - Database connection created. Kept until the object is destroyed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        private void connect()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the Driver for the database connection incase it is not loaded already. Then creates the connection to the database. And creases a Statement object from the connection.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
                 throws java.lang.Throwable
        Closes the connection when the object is destored.
        Overrides:
        finalize in class java.lang.Object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • processSQL

        public SerializableResult processSQL​(java.lang.String sql,
                                     boolean isQuery)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Executes the SQL Query/Update on the database and returns the result as SerializableResult.
        Specified by:
        processSQL in interface RMIInterface
        Parameters:
        sql - SQL Query/Update string
        isQuery - Whether SQL string is query or not.
        Returns:
        SerializableResult as the result of the sql query.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
